welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Neder-Over-Heembeek, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport, handling freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
